thread.title: Obama spends $2 million on airfare for golf
thread.title_full: Obama spends $2 million on airfare for golf

author: -NO AUTHOR-
title: Obama spends $2 million on airfare for golf
text:
Obama spends $2 million on airfare for golf Taxpayers on hook for 2 outings earlier this year Published: 3 hours ago 
(WASHINGTON EXAMINER) Two golf outings taken by President Obama earlier this year put taxpayers on the hook for nearly $2 million in costs on air transportation alone. 
The costs, released by government watchdog group Judicial Watch after filing a Freedom of Information Act request, showed that President Obama’s Presidents’ Day golf outing to Palm Springs, California in February ran up a price tag of $1,031,685. 
Obama also traveled to Palm City, Florida for a golf weekend in March that cost $804,870.30 for Air Force One expenses.
